Reviews.Title: “So far so good! I cant wait to get the rest!”
Reviews.Author: maria s
Reviews.Content: I have made reservations with this hotel for october coming up and so far im in love with the place and staff already. Even though I was a pest and had soo many inquiries and talked Mr. Brian's Ear off he remained so sweet and courteous. From what ive delt with so far i cant wait for my vacation here!!! Ill definatley be posting my stay so stay tuned! :-)

Reviews.Title: “Never stay at this hotel please!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: cstewa15
Reviews.Content: Okay so we get here and they were already rude. We get in the first room and the room was just dissatisfying. It had a sprite can holding the bathroom window up with sand all in the shower. Oviously the room was not cleaned. So we went to the lobby and requested a refund within the first five minutes of being here. He said no refunds so he just gave us a bigger supposily "better" room. (Which it wasnt they just threw in a flat screen.) We get in there and we checko the beds out and there was plain as day nut stains and pee on the sheets. And more pee stains on the pillow. We went back to front lobby and demanding a refund and he said no refunds and put his hands all in my boyfriends face saying "if you have stains on your face its like the stains on the sheets that won't go away"....umm what? Then he jusrt gave us sheets. That was it. And we left. Never in my life have I been to a hotel this nasty before. You have been warned!!

Reviews.Title: “I would sleep in my car before I went back.”
Reviews.Author: VayKayBabe
Reviews.Content: The rooms are dirty: The maids do not do their job and leave a note asking for a tip. The first night we stayed I pulled back the comforter and the sheets had sand in them which made me think they did't even wash them. There are two trash cans in the room. The maids emptied one and just moved the other one. Even worse, there was a cockroach in the bathroom. Half of the employees don't speak english (I say they just don't want to deal with problems). We reserved a smoking room and didn't have an ash tray, after asking for one it took them over thirty minuets to find one for our room. The internet didn't work in our room so we went to the front desk and asked Brian what to do about this. He told us to go across the parking lot and sit on a bench outside of someone else's room.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting hotel-not customer service oriented and RUDE!”
Reviews.Author: Joanne L
Reviews.Content: Checked in and wanted to change stay to one night only after finding out that I could have "No VIsitors". Brian at desk said 'It's liability". After that discovery I tried to change from two nights to one and he said - you have to call Booking.com (even though it wasn't paid for and all booking sites go by hotel rules/policies.) I said "Fine" and tried to use 2 credit cards to split payment-Nope Brian said he could not do that either. After complaining and getting nowhere I went to the room only to find that the light didn't work, the tv didn't work, and the refrig/micro didn't work. Room wasn't carpeted, bathroom looked dingy. After I told Brian I wanted to leave and go to Conch House he said "I know what goes on there- they've been busted for meth labs and prositiution. Never in my life have I seen a front desk person so unaccomodating. I've worked in hotels at the front desk myself for 3 years, and every hotel I worked at the philosophy was to make the guest happy. Not the philosophy here. Don't Stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Jeff C
Reviews.Content: We had two rooms. One king, one double bed. Rooms have been remodeled recently and were making upgrades to the grounds while we were there. Came with microwave, fridge, and flat screen tv. No hair dryers or irons. Clean, no bed bugs. Beds were comfortable. The best part is the garden and pool overlooking the ocean. Extremely great value. My dbl bed room with three people - $170 for three nights. The owner and manager were very friendly and helpful. This is your basic stay motel, not an high priced Hilton. I will return. Fyi- bring quarters to get your ice

Reviews.Title: “Watch your bank statement!”
Reviews.Author: Brandi M
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I wanted to stay on the beach in April and the prices were reasonable. Reviews stated clean and no bed bugs so we took our chances. First of all, when we arrived the credit card machine messed up and we were stuck in the office for 30 minutes while the desk clerk waited for the owner to assist with the machine. The owner treated his employee like he was an idiot for not knowing how to fix it. However, the clerk was nice enough to give us a room closer to the pool for our "inconvenience". A couple of days after returning home, I was looking over my statement online and noticed that the hotel had charged us twice for our stay. I called the hotel immediately and the man that answered the phone said he had to take his daughter to school and would call me back. No call back that day. Called my bank and they have credited the charge while it is investigated. Called the hotel back and was by clerk that all I had to do was fax a copy of my statement showing the double charge. Faxed the copy to them and received a call back from the owner stating they would not reimburse because there is a credit on my statement. I explained that the credit is from my bank because I disputed the charges and per the bank rep he would need to repay the bank as he's been paid twice. He refused to reverse my charges stating that the bank already took the money from him. I gave up and decided to let the bank fight it out with him. He will have to repay as he only has one receipt signed by me. I will NEVER stay here again. Do yourself a favor...pay a little extra to avoid the trouble. If I knew I was going to double pay, I could have stayed at the Hilton!

Reviews.Title: “treated badly!!!!”
Reviews.Author: John P
Reviews.Content: We booked for Bike Week, had our reservations, were told they didn't have us listed. There were 6 of us with confirmations. Sent to Atlantic Budget after paying here. Turns out owners are related - this was a scam - they had our reservations as the booking service asked why we didn't register. Butdge terrible and cheaper - had to fight for the difference in price at the two hotels. I would never do business with any America's Best Value again.

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: Whalesarealways
Reviews.Content: Front desk clerk and maintenance man are wonderful and compassionate men who made my fathers (who is handicapped) last minuet stay in this hotel a pleasant one.they went or of their way to make an impossible situation not only possible but comfortable .the hotel is nice for the price but the service is priceless .

Reviews.AuthorLocation: North Miami Beach, Florida, United States
Reviews.Title: “I loved it!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth R
Reviews.Content: I stayed overnight with my husband and my 11 yr old brother. The place is really cozy and the staff was really friendly. If you are expecting the Hilton, then check in at the Hilton; it is a great place for the price you pay. :o)

Reviews.Title: “I'll try somewhere else next ttime”
Reviews.Author: OrlandoHokie
Reviews.Content: I am a Value Club member of ABVI, so when I saw this hotel advertised, I selected it over other comparable hotels. First, when I arrived, the actual price I paid for a three day stay was a little more than was quoted online. The front desk manager offered to upgrade me..for a significant increase in price. (I thought as a member I could get a better deal than what was offered.) The room we got, while clean, was near the road and had NOWHERE to hang clothes that were on a hanger except right under the TV stand. Even though it was a non-smoking room, there was a musty smell when we first arrived and the only blanket was the comforter on top of the bed. (This had a hole in it). We did have some difficulty with noisy neighbors, but given it was over New Year's, I'll discount that. Most ABVIs have breakfast--this one does not. The parking is difficult to maneuver out of. Our room key demagnetized one day early(!). (Trying to tell us something?) To top it all off, we had asked the front desk clerk early on in our stay if we could have a 12:00 check out. He said no problem, "at no extra charge" We were surprised, when we received a knock at 11:00 from someone asking us if we were leaving or were staying another day. He was surprised when we told him of the arrangement. I only give this a 3 star because the hotel is on the beach, the room was clean when we got there (although our bed was never made over a three day stay) and there is a nice lounge area near the pool. There are too many hotels in Daytona Beach, though, to recommend this one.

Reviews.Title: “Best low price hotel on the beach”
Reviews.Author: upsetlocal
Reviews.Content: Great small hotel,awesome pool and courtyard areas complete with water fountains that relax all your troubles away as you look over the ocean.I stayed couple of different times always clean and for the money you will not find a better place.Rooms all have tile and new paint,this is a nice small hotel that the owners have put a lot of work into.In the off season I stay for 40 a nite.I hope the word gets out this is a diamond out of all the little beachside hotels in Daytona Beach

Reviews.Title: “Did I get what I paid for?”
Reviews.Author: wmiskelly
Reviews.Content: I booked a single no-smoking room with king bed for 2 nights over the internet. The price was quite reasonable: $119 for two nights including 12.5% tax. I did notice, however, when I arrived that the sign in front of the hotel said "all singles $35. a night". I checked in and went right to my room. It was a large single room with tiled flooring. It was very clean, but had a very musty smell. There were 2 tiny cakes of soap in the bathroom and no shampoo. One of the 2 lights by the bed did not work. The room had an older tv, but was in good working order with a large number of channels from which to choose. Aside from the lingering odor, the room was ok.....and $119 for two nights is a bargain these days. Besides, the motel was directly on the beach and was attractive on the outside. My 2nd night was a nitemare! No fault of the motel, directly anyway. It seems they registered a large group of people around midnight. For a good 2 hours, these people hollered back and forth. The ones in the room above me made one heck of a racket all that time. One of their car alarms (just outside my room) went off 4 times. That led me to believe they were breaking into cars. They were not, however. Just wandering around the parking lot and making a lot of noise. My second day, I decided to ask why I was not charged $35/nite. I was told that price was for just a few rooms that I definitely would not want to stay in. He even told me he would show me those rooms to prove that I wouldn't want them! Anyway, for a room in a motel directly on the beach....the price is right. Barebones, clean but smelly.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC HOTEL, WARM STAFF, WE'LL BE BACK!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lamoreia
Reviews.Content: Lets start with Brian, the bomb. It was his dilligence at getting us the best rate and the exact room we needed, that closed the deal. He showed us the rooms and walked with me around the property. It was the weekend and we came with no real plan. The hotel looked really nice, and when he showed us the room, all I can say is that it smelled good, nice tile floor, bathrooms with no rust or water stains from a drippy faucet (yeah, you know that hotel), no sign of mildew or mold. Free of sand, and neat looking room with fridge, micro, HBO and internet. Our room overlooked the pool so my kids could come and go without me having to follow them everywhere, and the beach was a hop away. Upon entering the room, my toddler immediatly, accidently, locked himself in the bathroom. Brian was there in a minute to let the little guy out. At 9:00 PM, when I couldnt connect to the internet, he was there again. A man constantly swept sand and debris from the parking lot, stairs and walkway. Renovations were going on all day near the swing that overlooks the ocean. Can't wait to see what it turns into next year. We asked for some extra towels and things, and by the time we got back from breakfast, everything was there. I have to say, this was truly our best Daytona Beach vacation, alot due to the hotel. Small and quaint, it provided the 'family' vacation we were looking for. Never crowded, always a place to relax. We did go up and down Atlantic Ave. stopping in to different hotels. Iiiiick. Condensation building in the hallways, puddles and sand on the broken cement floors, doors that don't really close, much less lock, and sandy gritty beds that make you wonder. Have I mentioned the smell??? What IS that smell anyway? We will definatly be booking next year, or sooner if possible. And one more little detail that really made our day----On our last day, of course the kids HAD to feel the waves one last time. Van packed as checkout time came and went.... Brian went the extra mile again and helped us to get cleaned up and changed before we left. Great Vacation, can't say enough the staff and our clean room. And of course, Thank you Brian!!!

Reviews.Title: “"very nice and on the beach!!!"”
Reviews.Author: TonyLeah
Reviews.Content: Very nice and clean hotel. Oceanview but on the beach. Very clean, nice pool also. Has a sitting area facing the beach and also a swing facing then beach to enjoy the views. Steps down to the beach.

Reviews.Title: “THEY REMODELED, BUT ONLY SO MUCH YOU CAN CHANGE”
Reviews.Author: playboy1950
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed here for 1 night 4/16/11. The manager told me that this was once a Red Carpet Inn. He also stated that they have spent a lot of money to refurbish the motel. The outside show the improvements; however, there's only so much that can be done to a 1960's motel room. We were placed in a kitchenette room (didn't ask for one), which was okay. The room although dated, and with no frills, was quiet, and comfortable with no bugs. Considering location and price, this was not a bad place to stay for a night or two.

Reviews.Title: “Can't complain for the price”
Reviews.Author: albeard
Reviews.Content: Being a couple that is expecting a baby in July, we were looking to take a nice vacation during Spring Break but we were not looking for the extreme prices that usually come with that. Which was why we were surprised to find a beach side hotel at such a cheap rate. We paid $53.10 per night for five nights. Upon arriving, I was not expecting a 5 star hotel but I was expecting a slightly cleaner room than we received. First off, the gentleman in the office did not even bother to check my reservation, and he almost gave us the wrong type of room. I had to remind him that we needed a king size bed rather than two twin beds. After that, upon entering our room, we found small black bugs all in the window of the room behind the curtain. They were only in this area of the room and after killing them all, we have not had any other issues with this. We assume someone left the door open and the bugs were able to get in. Other than that small issue, the room was fine. Being right next to the beach was an awesome feature and the pool is also very well kept up and clean. If you are looking for a cheap beach side hotel and are okay with having just that, then this hotel will be perfect for you.

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as the reviews......I think they remodeled....”
Reviews.Author: nezzzbitt
Reviews.Content: I was recently in Daytona Beach and decided to check out this hotel while driving by. The rooms were 49.00 a nite so we stayed for two nites. I was kind of scared when opening the door to the room, but was pleasantly surprised. The rooms must of been recently remodeled because there was no carpet in the rooms, it was new flooring. The beds were new and very comfortable as well as the bedding. The bathroom had a new shower and sink and flooring. You could tell they recently did some renovations. They are not the best renovations but the rooms were clean. There was some odd odor but it was tolerable. Nice view of the beach and very close by. The front desk was very helpful and also gave a care package with razors and lotions and body wash etc.......Don't let the reviews scare you away.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Nice Clean Rooms!”
Reviews.Author: clevercandle
Reviews.Content: We went to Daytona Beach for my Birthday, we didn't make reservations. We arrived 8/7/09 and stayed thru 8/11/09 When we arrived at the hotel the man at the desk was polite gave us a great deal on 3 nights. $155 before tax. We looked at the room before we checked in. It was cozy, clean, and inviting. The a/c was very cold and the water was hot although it did lack pressure in the shower. The hotel did have a slight parking issue, but we went out late on Saturday night to get a bite to eat and when we returned the night manager had saved us a parking spot right up front and close to our room.. This hotel was in a great location, the staff were all friendly. We did have to pay a quarter per bucket of ice, but other that a couple of small issues we had a great time and will definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “If you want a horrible vacation experience come here.”
Reviews.Author: danicorky
Reviews.Content: pictures mean nothing. this hotel was dirty. when we got our room there was broken glass on the bed, under the sink and it reeked of beer. when we told housekeeping they made it seem like it was an inconvenience. we had to argue just to get clean linens. when we got there the hotel staff wasnt friendly, he seemed to be a bit upset that we came between his myspace time and he also changed the rates from what we were charged from orbitz. there's only one way in and out. all in all, i would never come back to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “liars and scamers”
Reviews.Author: misman1511
Reviews.Content: The gist of our stay is that it was [--]. We booked a non smoking room and got put in the most repulsing, disgusting room we had ever seen, which was smoking. Then we asked for a refund the for the next day and Brian said he would give it to us. Well he was not there and the manager claims that his faithful employee would never say that to us, and when Brian came in he denied ever saying that . The clencher of our trip was that when we were packing our car Brian applogized for not giving us our refund and he said that he could not do that infront of his boss. We will never stay here again in my life!!! Doesnt even deserve a 1 star rating

Reviews.Title: “great staff keeps us coming back”
Reviews.Author: wbcj52
Reviews.Content: nice quiet stay with Brian and Joann tending to our room daily. Room is always very clean and fresh,they should get a raise! We could stay elsewhere,but not for the money. we have been customers for 4 years!

Reviews.Title: “The Worst Motel Ever”
Reviews.Author: leslu919395
Reviews.Content: this is the most nastiest rat house ever when we stayed there it was because we couldnt go back home because of a terrible storm i rather sleep outside. we found 3 lizards crawling on the walls the bathroom was scary and there was such a bad smell of cigarretesas that it is hard to breathe they even gave us free cheap .99 cents body spray to spray the discusting rooms. the rooms were trailer trash and everyone was able to look into your crappy room all those crazy drunk people what a bad experience the beach is beautiful but this red carpet inn whose name should be changed to TRASH INN it is nasty the people that work there clean the rooms and take the bed sheets of inside of a half broken shopping cart, the people staying there were scary this thing was our last resort i dont want to remember that horrible nightnare i dont reccomend this thing to anyone so whenever you go to daytona think twice before staying in this trash. you'll regret it.

Reviews.Title: “Never Agian”
Reviews.Author: randim2006
Reviews.Content: We booked our trip online and paid more then the others staying there, we must have got charged for our mouse we caught in a sticky trap after he got in our food. There was also pubic hair in our shower both in the tub and on the curtain. We also had a tub that did not drain and who wants to clean up while standing in the dirty water. Managment was nice but the owner was not friendly at all. I will never book a hotel online agian unless I know someone that stayed there!

Reviews.Title: “A great bargin!”
Reviews.Author: one_true_lady_99
Reviews.Content: A wonderful little quiet place to get away. The rooms are very clean. The staff is wonderful! They are their to see you have everything you need and want. If you want to save your money for your vacation and not spend it all on a place to stay this place is for you!

Reviews.Title: “the best cheap hotel on the beach”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: got my $ worth 69 bucks for as close to paradise as i'll get sitting on the picnic tables sippin margarita's watching the waves crash just what i needed staff was friendly and helpful well worth it recommend this place to anyone

Reviews.Title: “89$ room Crap Crap Crap”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I spent 89$ on a shoe box with one bed and a large cockroach. It smelled. It was damp and it should be condemded. This place was so disgusting. The cleaning people had grocery carts for thier cleaning products. ENOUGH SAID. Do not stay here at all if you work hard for your money and enjoy clean and sanitized facilities.

Reviews.Title: “Give this one a miss”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this hotel at all. The rooms are small and cheaply furnished. They are also over-priced. The motel owner / manager seems to be a complete neurotic and follows the guests around - when my friend challenged him we were told he was checking for extra guests for which we had to pay (there were only two of us in a 2 bed room!). There are only a couple of rooms with ocean view and these are grotty too (small windows) - the rest overlook the car lot.

Reviews.Title: “never stay here”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: we have reservation for this hotel but the owner of hotel tried to screw us over. we was booked at 90 a night but when we got there he wanted to charge us 199 a night. our room was suppose to be with 2 double beds but he did not give us that room he gave us a room with queen bed and no room to move around. the room was a dump the owner will not work with you.never stay there

HotelInfo.Name: Americas Best Value Inn - Daytona Beach North
HotelInfo.Address: 1400 North Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
